modName: Bizzaro glitch fix for weird lines
summary:
A fix for ppl who added HD body and face Textures but now have weird shadows and lines on said textures.
Version 2 has no impact on FPS or your other settings. If you DL version 1, just reDL and do over. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s16.postimg.org/6pszc826d/65163_1_1430164101.png[/img]
Version 2,
A glitch fix for ppl who added HD body and face Textures but now have weird shadows and lines on said textures.

Please give feedback if the instructions are confusing in any way!

=====================================================================================
If you downloaded and followed Fix Version 1, and are experiancing FPS loss,
set the "Shadows" option back to your prevoius setting, and use Fix Version 2.
======================================================================================
:D

=====================================================
Credits;
Myself, Howlest

and 4EverLol4Life, for coming up with the term "Bizzaro". Kudos man!
author: Howlest

files.name: Bizzaro Lines Fix v2
files.changelogHtml:
Located .ini file that makes it all better.
Rewrote the instructions for this .ini and made them easyer to understand.
Uploaded pictures to help explain.
Should be my last update.
